TopicTitle: What are you doing in KSP right now?

Articles.Content:
Planning a Mun infrastructure.

I have a pair of motherships that are going to be filled with equipment and sent across. Hopefully I can get a decent base going. Maybe even a Kethane mining facility for orbital refuel.

Designing an outpost to complete a mission to Ike, which will also be my first interplanetary voyage. Got the requirements covered, just refining the landing system and then need to work out how to get it there. Over 2.2 mil total in fees though, so there is a good incentive....

G
Driving around Duna. I've already covered enough distance to count, including trips to both poles, but now I'm doing it "for real."
Building a Karbonite mine on Mun, and an orbital refueller at Minmus, waiting for a transfer window to... anywhere... Probably Jool>Laythe
I've been working on a shuttle. Pain in the butt when trying to balance CoT and CoM, and then the TWR. Might have to redesign the orbiter, but hopefully not.

working on a TRUE VTOL

also a jet-powered monster truck

I've been working on a shuttle. Pain in the butt when trying to balance CoT and CoM, and then the TWR. Might have to redesign the orbiter, but hopefully not.

http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/37487341571223258/C0137658FD014BD5D66DDC93264AEC2715F356FC/

Nice shuttle!

I'm sitting on a nice fat stack of cash in career mode, so I thought I'd burn some of it up and send out a few return craft for Kerbals I have stranded stationed on various space stations.

So, towards that end, my current list for today is:

  1. Send up a large orange tank (or maybe one of the really big ones? hmm...) to attach to the station orbiting Kerban. That will create a refueling station for number 2, as well as possible future missions.
  2. Create a SSTO reusable space plane to shuttle Kerbals to and from my Kerban space station.
  3. After that's done, create a return craft to send to Duna to collect some Kerbals I have stationed there, along with a fresh crew to take their place.

After that I will do a few more Exploration missions, I think.

A couple of things. I'm training a rescue crew to save Bob, Bill, and Doodhat (my main/best Kerbals) from the Jool system so I can send them to Moho. On the side I've been launching satellites around Kerbin, and at least one to Eve and to Bop for communications relays. I use the antenna range mod, but modified values. Slightly increased the Whip's range and the second antenna's too, but decreased the third one's range because it could pretty much work anywhere in the system. I don't want a loss in communication to make probes stop working though, I just want to have to use relays for farther out missions. I also like the idea of a relay's orbit putting it on the other side of the main body in whatever system I'm in and I temporarily lose comms. It's a very minor thing, but still thrilling without being masochistic.

I'm playing Career mode (and having a blast!) and saving up money for the lvl.3 science center. At 2.3 million now, still about a mil to go. Mostly doing Kerbin missions with a suborbital plane as I've yet to make a functional SSTO, though I've also launched a few satellites. Still too chicken to go to the Mun or Minmus. Hopefully soon...

Planning a Mun infrastructure.

Same here. Though I''m spending most of my time conducting research*.

*By research I mean see-saws, jets, mass murder... Just the basics!

Having recently started a new Career on "Moderate" I'm currently trying to design an economical Munshot vehicle capable of landing a kerbal and returning. My usual design practices lean heavily towards over-design and having very large margins for error, which can be terribly expensive and funds are harder to come by than I'm used to.

I'm trying to build a useful spacestation in LKO that holds sufficient fuel for missions that go further.

Just need something that has enough fuel left to transfer over after docking maneuver...

Using the kash-korp rivers and roadster for immense speeds, so far got up to 140 mph.

Edited January 29, 2015 by soranetame

Three words:

Joolian Exploratory Fleet.

Uh, does making a simple mod for personal use count (potentially released if I make a model i'm actually happy with, the current one is basically a flattened cube, and if it doesn't fall through the ground and blow up constantly)

I couldn't find any screenshots (I swear I pressed F1 like 10 times), but it's basically a backpack (wearable with KAS, otherwise pretty useless) with life support supplies (if TAC life support is installed), an antenna, and KAS storage space.
Right now I'm trying to land on Eve and come back up.

Before I accepted a Class C Asteroid Survey Mission I checked to see if there were any suitable. The only one that was available was going to get captured by Kerbins SOI and then collide with the Kerbin itself.

I am waiting for the asteroid to enter Kerbon SOI, capture it and place it in orbit between Kerbin and the Mun. After that is done I'll di the survey mission.

Trying to get my Vall station autonomous in MKS/OKS. I might have been a bit optimistic in sending 8 kerbals there.

Got a shipment of rocketparts arriving in about 100 days; should be enough to get the needed parts built.
Bump!
Have 2 station specific orbit contracts awaiting when I get home.
In the middle of Jool-5; I just achieved orbit. Not the most impressive mission but it works.

In the middle of Jool-5; I just achieved orbit. Not the most impressive mission but it works.

Nice, was thinking of attempting it too but I still have no idea how I'm going to store enough fuel.
Currently building the ISS. So far it looks like this:

How to play while caring for a 5 week old baby...

Started a new save in sandbox so going to throw up a fuel depot, fly up some space planes and head for Eve and maybe go manned to Moho
